import React, { useState } from 'react'; function GameLobby({ onJoinRoom, onJoinAsSpectator, onCreateRoom }) { const [playerName, setPlayerName] = useState(''); const [roomId, setRoomId] = useState(''); const [activeTab, setActiveTab] = useState('join'); // 'join' or 'create' const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); if (playerName.trim() && roomId.trim()) { onJoinRoom(playerName.trim(), roomId.trim()); } }; const handleSpectatorJoin = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); if (playerName.trim() && roomId.trim()) { onJoinAsSpectator(playerName.trim(), roomId.trim()); } }; const handleCreateRoom = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); if (playerName.trim()) { const newRoomId = Math.random().toString(36).substring(2, 8).toUpperCase(); onCreateRoom(playerName.trim(), newRoomId); } }; const generateRoomId = () => { const id = Math.random().toString(36).substring(2, 8).toUpperCase(); setRoomId(id); }; return (

AI Prompt Guesser

{activeTab === 'create' && (

Create a New Game Room

Start your own game and invite friends!

setPlayerName(e.target.value)} placeholder="Enter your name" maxLength={20} required autoComplete="username" />
üëë You'll be the room creator with full control
üéØ Set the number of rounds (1-10)
üîó Get a unique room code to share
)} {activeTab === 'join' && (

Join an Existing Room

Enter a room code to join the fun!

setPlayerName(e.target.value)} placeholder="Enter your name" maxLength={20} required />
setRoomId(e.target.value.toUpperCase())} placeholder="Enter 6-character room code" maxLength={6} required />
)}

üéÆ How to Play

üìù Game Flow

  • Create Prompt: One player writes a short prompt (max 20 characters)
  • AI Magic: AI generates an image from the prompt
  • Guess Time: Other players guess the original prompt (max 20 characters)
  • Score Points: Earn points based on how close your guess is!
  • Rotate Turns: Everyone gets to be the prompt creator

‚è±Ô∏è Timing

  • Prompt Phase: 30 seconds to create your prompt
  • Guessing Phase: 30 seconds to guess the prompt
  • Results: 8 seconds to review scores and see the original prompt

üèÜ Scoring System

  • 90-100% match: Full points (90-100)
  • 70-89% match: Great score (63-80 points)
  • 50-69% match: Good score (40-55 points)
  • 30-49% match: Decent score (21-34 points)
  • 20-29% match: Some points (12-17 points)
  • Speed Bonus: First 3 good guesses get bonus points!

üí° Pro Tips

  • You can submit multiple guesses - keep trying!
  • Think about synonyms and alternative words
  • Simple, clear prompts work best for AI
  • Speed matters - quick accurate guesses get bonus points
  • 2-8 players can join a room
); } export default GameLobby;
